Description: Find the coffee machine and with the help of a mug pour a hot cup of coffee.
Take a soap bottle with dish sponge and clean the dirty plates and bowls in the sink basin.
Find an apple in the room and cut it with a knife.
Find some bread in the room and toast it in a toaster.
Find a pan and an egg,turn on the stove knob and on the counter top
slice some tomatoes, and add it into a pot and boil it till it become a soup.
slice some lecttuce, and add it into a pot and boil it till it become a soup.
Find a pot and add some water to boil it on a counter top.
Find the cracked eggs in the room and once found check for broken one,if found throw it in the dustbin.
Throw away all the spoiled products.
Pick up potato in the room. Use knife to slice potato. Put potato onto a plate. Put plate into microwave. Microwave to desired doneness.
Locate winebottle in room. Pour wine into cup.
Find egg in room. Put in fridge. Find lettuce in room. Put in fridge.
Find cup in room. Go to sink. Turn on faucet to fill cup.
Find potato in room. Peel potato with knife. Find pot in room. Go to sink. Fill pot with water from faucet. Place pot on stove. Run on stove knob range. Boil potato in water to desired doneness.
Locate apple slices in room. Pick up apple slices. Carry to bin and place inside.

Find butterknife in room. Open drawer and place inside, leaving drawer open. Find fork in room. Place inside drawer. Find knife in room. Place inside drawer. Find spatula in room. Place inside drawer. Find spoon in room. Place inside drawer. Close drawer.

Task: Pour away coffee in a cup_20_5
Description: Find cup in room. Take cup to coffeemachine. Pour coffee into cup.
Find pot of water in room. Pick up pot. Walk to sink. Pour water into sinkbasin.
Locate lightswitch in kitchen. Walk to lightswitch. Flip lightswitch into off position.
Move laptop closer. Touch the laptop to activate it.
Locate remote. Walk to remote. Pick up remote. Walk to sofa. Face the television. Press the power button on the remote. Sit on sofa. Observe the television.

Task: Check the timing on the watch_201_5
Description: Find the watch. Then check the timing on the watch
Put the tissue box into the box. Also the credit card, the keychain, the remote, and the fertility statue.
Pick up the tissue box that in on the coffee table next to the box and throw into the bin.

Task: Turn off the table lamp or desk lamp_218_5
Description: Find the table lamp. Turn the table lamp off.
Find the hand phone. Take the hand phone as smash it against the dog statue until it's cracked.
Find and pick up the hand phone. Use the hand phone.
Remove all of the objects that are on the sofa and place them on the chair.
Locate book in room. Walk to book. Pick up book. Walk to sofa. Sit on sofa. Read book.
